page.title: 07Lifestyle
page.content:
Inhabitants work long hours on the land during the summer months, with more recreational activities in the winter. They travel to public houses, with local seaside resort within ten miles.
Indoor recreation includes; snooker, badminton, dominoes, dancing, evening classes - at Croston, Rufford or Tarleton. Home entertainment - TV, video, radio. Clubs - Womens Institute at Rufford, Croston and Tarleton, church groups, Hazelgrove Sunshine Club (nudist). Outdoor recreation includes; shooting, hunting, fishing, boating, gardening, pigeon racing, bowling. With the dredging of the stretch of the Leeds-Liverpool canal, thereby affording access to the Irish Sea by way of the river, there is an increase in pleasure boating.
